Posts.Content: Trish my prayers are with you throughout your battle with the beast. May you stay strong.
Posts.Title: Regarding Irishwhispers

Posts.Content: sunrae, good luck tommorow. I hope everything goes smoothly for you so that you can get on with your surgery and start healing emotionally and physically. I will say a prayer for you tonite. Hugs, Terri
Posts.Title: Feeling Bad but Looking forward to Heart Cath Tomorrow

Posts.Content: Sunrae, You will be in my thoughts and prayers as you go through your testing and surgery. I will pray that everything goes smoothly for you. Good luck to you.
Posts.Title: Finally Made My Decision Re Surgery

Posts.Content: Jenny, I will be there with you in thoughts and prayers. I can imagine how nervous you must be because every year when it was time for my mammogram I would be so nervous and this was before I was dx this past dec. I am sure I will be a basket case myself when my time after treatment comes around. I know it's hard but just try to keep positive thoughts and I hope to hear good news from you soon. Hugs, Terri
Posts.Title: Say a prayer for me please...
